analysis.Summary: Vue 3 single-file component that renders an SVG icon (a price tag) with a customizable fill color.
analysis.Purpose: Provide a reusable price-tag icon component for the UI, allowing parent components to control its fill color and CSS classes.

Components.name: IconPrice
Components.responsibility: Renders a price-tag SVG graphic; exposes a `fill` prop to customize the icon color; forwards any additional attributes (e.g. CSS classes) to the `<path>` element.

Functions.name: defineProps
Functions.purpose: Defines the `fill` prop for the component.

analysis.Usage:
Import and register (or auto-import) `IconPrice.vue` in any Vue component. Example:

```js
import IconPrice from 'modules/icons/entities/IconPrice.vue'
export default {
  components: { IconPrice }
}
```

Then in template:
```html
<IconPrice fill="#FF0000" class="my-icon-size" />
```
Notes: Uses `<script setup>` and the Composition API `defineProps`.
Forwards arbitrary HTML attributes (e.g. `class`, `style`) via `$attrs` onto the `<path>` element.
Default fill color uses a CSS variable `--black`; consumers can override via the `fill` prop.
No internal state or methods; purely presentational.
